definitions.explanation_en: A feminine given name of Greek origin, often considered a diminutive of Theresa or Teresa, and used as a standalone personal name in English-speaking countries.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自希腊语的女性名，常被视为 Theresa 或 Teresa 的昵称形式，但在英语国家中也作为独立的个人名字使用。
definitions.example_en: Tessa is a talented filmmaker who recently won an international award.
definitions.example_cn: 特莎是一位才华横溢的电影制作人，最近赢得了一项国际大奖。
